'''Sailing Breeze''' is a shop in [[Ritou]], [[Inazuma]] owned by [[Karpillia]]. It used to be a old brand of alcohol in Mondstadt but the shop had to migrate to Inazuma because of its incapability to compete against [[Dawn Winery]]<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Clemens}}</ref>
